fullForm: Maharashtra Common Entrance Test for Pharmacy
conductingBody: Maharashtra State Common Entrance Test Cell
eligibility: Candidates must have passed or appeared in 10+2 (HSC) or equivalent examination with Physics and Chemistry as compulsory subjects along with Mathematics or Biology, from a recognized board. Detailed eligibility is provided in the official notification.

faqs.question: What is the official website to check MHT CET Pharmacy results?
faqs.answer: The official website to check MHT CET Pharmacy results is cetcell.mahacet.org.
